Traits.Name: Body of the Land
Traits.Description: When defeated, roll a d6. The Hob collapses into the natural land, disappearing. Every space of this Hob becomes a height 1 terrain piece (5-6), difficult terrain (2-4), or a pit (1).

Traits.Name: Phasing
Traits.Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Traits.Name: Overwhelming Stench
Traits.Description: The hob has aura 1. Attackers in the aura gain +1 curse on attacks, and any character that ends their turn in the aura must save or become slow and poisoned. Poisoned characters take [D].
